001package ca.gc.cra.radar.api.tools;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.api.CliArgsParser;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.capture.SegmentRecord;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.SegmentIoAdapter;
006import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
007import java.nio.file.Path;
008import java.time.Instant;
009import java.time.ZoneId;
010import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
011import java.util.Map;
012
013/**
014 * CLI utility that scans recorded segment files for a byte sequence and prints matches with context.
015 */
016public final class SegbinGrepCli {
017  private static final DateTimeFormatter TS =
018      DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("uuuu-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSS").withZone(ZoneId.systemDefault());
019
020  private SegbinGrepCli() {}
021  /**
022   * Scans segment binaries for a literal byte pattern and prints matches with ASCII context.
023   *
024   * @param args CLI arguments such as {@code needle} and {@code in}; {@code needle} must be non-empty
025   * @throws Exception if segment files cannot be read
026   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
027   */
028  public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
029    Map<String, String> kv = CliArgsParser.toMap(args);
030    String inputDir = kv.getOrDefault("in", "./cap-out");
031    String needle = kv.getOrDefault("needle", "");
032    int ctx = parseInt(kv.getOrDefault("ctx", "32"));
033
034    if (needle == null || needle.isBlank()) {
035      usage();
036      return;
037    }
038
039    byte[] pattern = needle.getBytes(StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);
040    int total = 0;
041    int hits = 0;
042
043    try (SegmentIoAdapter.Reader reader = new SegmentIoAdapter.Reader(Path.of(inputDir))) {
044      SegmentRecord record;
045      while ((record = reader.next()) != null) {
046        total++;
047        byte[] payload = record.payload();
048        if (payload.length == 0) {
049          continue;
050        }
051        int offset = indexOf(payload, pattern);
052        if (offset >= 0) {
053          hits++;
054          int start = Math.max(0, offset - ctx);
055          int end = Math.min(payload.length, offset + pattern.length + ctx);
056          String left = toAscii(payload, start, offset);
057          String mid = toAscii(payload, offset, offset + pattern.length);
058          String right = toAscii(payload, offset + pattern.length, end);
059          System.out.printf(
060              "%s GREP %s:%d -> %s:%d seq=%d len=%d off=%d%n",
061              TS.format(toInstant(record.timestampMicros())),
062              record.srcIp(),
063              record.srcPort(),
064              record.dstIp(),
065              record.dstPort(),
066              record.sequence(),
067              payload.length,
068              offset);
069          System.out.printf("        \"%s[%s]%s\"%n", left, mid, right);
070        }
071      }
072    }
073
074    System.out.printf("Scanned %,d segments, matches: %,d%n", total, hits);
075  }
076
077  private static void usage() {
078    System.err.println(
079        "Usage: needle=STRING [in=./cap-out ctx=32]  -- scans segment binaries for a literal byte sequence");
080  }
081
082  private static int parseInt(String s) {
083    try {
084      return Integer.parseInt(s);
085    } catch (NumberFormatException ex) {
086      return 32;
087    }
088  }
089
090  private static int indexOf(byte[] haystack, byte[] needle) {
091    if (needle.length == 0 || haystack.length < needle.length) {
092      return -1;
093    }
094    outer:
095    for (int i = 0; i <= haystack.length - needle.length; i++) {
096      for (int j = 0; j < needle.length; j++) {
097        if (haystack[i + j] != needle[j]) {
098          continue outer;
099        }
100      }
101      return i;
102    }
103    return -1;
104  }
105
106  private static String toAscii(byte[] data, int start, int end) {
107    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(Math.max(0, end - start));
108    for (int i = start; i < end; i++) {
109      int c = data[i] & 0xFF;
110      if (c >= 32 && c < 127) {
111        sb.append((char) c);
112      } else {
113        sb.append('.');
114      }
115    }
116    return sb.toString();
117  }
118
119  private static Instant toInstant(long timestampMicros) {
120    long seconds = Math.floorDiv(timestampMicros, 1_000_000L);
121    long micros = Math.floorMod(timestampMicros, 1_000_000L);
122    return Instant.ofEpochSecond(seconds, micros * 1_000L);
123  }
124}
125
126
